Posts.Content: The waiting is unbearable  One minute I tell myself it's going to be ok then I worry if I think this it will be tempting fate just cannot wait until Friday is here  I think It's the not knowing at the moment for me that is driving me crazy  Once I know what I am dealing with I can get my head in a better space and deal with what is to come  This is My first post on the site and like you say people are very supportive  Thank you for replying
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply I feel so silly when I read everyone else's stories  Everyone on here is so kind and very brave  This week has been one of the longest weeks of my life I cannot wait for tomorrow to be here to see what is what My poor family I have just isolated myself from everyone just wishing Friday to be here  I rang the screening place on Monday and they said that my scan showed slight changes whatever that means hopefully will be good news tomorrow I have everything crossed
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Thank you so much  As I have said everyone has been so kind  I am very grateful for everyone's advise
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Hi guys I am 54 years old and have had now 3 mammograms since turning 50  The first was a recall as they had nothing to compare with and thankfully everything was ok The second was clear The third well not I have another recall for this Friday I am so anxious about this as they have so many previous ones to compare with so I feel very worried that there is something wrong  Has this happened to any body else and if so what was your outcome
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Thank you so much  I am so relieved xx
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I have just got back from my recall and thankfully it was good news  The problem was my breast must have moved while being scanned as it showed something not right but after 5 more X-rays and and unltra sound there was nothing there  This does go to show that being recalled doesn't mean anything bad I just wish there was a way this could not happen to others  Thank god You lovely people have helped me this week and I really want to say how brace and lovely you all are  Sending lots of hugs to you all
Posts.Title: Mammogram recall
